name: Tickets - PKPB @ King Tuts, Glasgow, 14th Jan 2014
description:
Our first show of what is sure to be a busy 2014 at King Tut's Wah Wah Hut in Glasgow as part of New Years Revolution.

Our show is on Tues 14th Jan. 

Face value of the ticket is £7.50, however, you can buy from us for £6.00 inc. postage.

name: Sand Draw Tee
description:
Penguins Kill Polar Bears t-shirt in sand colour with black print.

T Shirted designed by the talented Ben Sears. Check out Ben's work here - http://bensears.tumblr.com/

name: Navy Heart Logo Tee
description:
Navy blue Penguins Kill Polar Bears T-shirt with white heart logo in breast pocket position. 

Designed by our very good friend Jon Arbuthnot. Check out Jon's work here - http://jonarbuthnottgraphicdesign.tumblr.com/

name: Vessels and Veins *SOLD OUT*
description:
Physical copies are now sold out but the EP is still available from all your favourite digital retailers.

Vessels & Veins is the second EP from the band. The EP is a sweeping masterpiece, showcasing a band that are as comfortable with experimentation as they are tried and true rock formulae. Each track explodes into action, with walls of reverb-laden guitars layered over the top of throbbing percussion, and offset by Ben's raw vocals. 

Released via Mountain Halo Records

Avaliable for mail order now!

name: Dawn *SOLD OUT*
description:
Physical copies are now sold out but the EP is still available from all your favourite digital retailers.

"Penguins Kill Polar Bears debut release, the Dawn EP, showcases post-rock done the right way. It is epic in every sense and brings to the fore an extremely talented group of young musicians. 
Opening track Homebound is an absolute beast, starting off with a light bit of delayed guitar before it kicks in and bombards you with an onslaught of sound. Throughout the EP this is what the band do best; the light-heavy dynamics work perfectly, building tracks to massive crescendos that will be sure to knock you back a few feet in appreciation." -Favourite Son

1. Homebound
2. Sand Castles
3. In Everything
4. 3:09
5. Valley
